"Koffie":
"<%me>.
Great work.
Thank you for all your hard work. This is administrator Koffie."
"In light of your recent activities, we have granted you permission to change to a new Class."
"The Class is called \"Hero.\" It is an Advanced Class designed to combat multiple enemies at once."
"Due to the immense strain it places on one's body, access is only granted to ARKS who have reached a certain level."
"Given all your accomplishments, I'm sure you'll master it quickly. I wish you good luck."
